version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="pncmother"> <pncmother id="9" name="PNC (mother)"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <visitNumber/> <vitaminA/> <ttDose/> <location/> <house/> <community/> <referred/> <maleInvolved/> <lochiaColour/> <lochiaOdourFoul/> <lochiaAmountExcess/> <temperature/> <fht/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>motherpnc-jf</formname> </pncmother> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/pncmother/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/pncmother/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/pncmother/date" required="true()" type="xsd:dateTime"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/pncmother/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="visitNumber" nodeset="/pncmother/visitNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="vitaminA" nodeset="/pncmother/vitaminA" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="ttDose" nodeset="/pncmother/ttDose" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="location" nodeset="/pncmother/location" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="house" nodeset="/pncmother/house" relevant="/pncmother/location = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="community" nodeset="/pncmother/community" relevant="/pncmother/location = '2'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/pncmother/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="maleInvolved" nodeset="/pncmother/maleInvolved" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="lochiaColour" nodeset="/pncmother/lochiaColour" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="lochiaOdourFoul" nodeset="/pncmother/lochiaOdourFoul" type="xsd:string" required="true()"/> <xf:bind id="lochiaAmountExcess" nodeset="/pncmother/lochiaAmountExcess" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 30 and . <= 48" id="temperature" message="Value out of range: must be between 30 and 48" nodeset="/pncmother/temperature" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 12 and . <= 40" id="fht" message="Value out of range: must be between 12 and 40" nodeset="/pncmother/fht" type="xsd:decimal"/> <xf:bind id="comments" nodeset="/pncmother/comments" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/pncmother/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/pncmother/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page3</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Visit date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="visitNumber"> <xf:label>Visit Number</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>PNC 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>PNC 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>PNC 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="vitaminA"> <xf:label>Vitamin A</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="ttDose"> <xf:label>TT</xf:label> <xf:item id="NA"> <xf:label>No TT on this visit</xf:label> <xf:value>NA</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>TT 1</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>TT 2</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>TT 3</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>TT 4</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="5"> <xf:label>TT 5</xf:label> <xf:value>5</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="location"> <xf:label>Location</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Facility or clinic</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Home</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>Outreach</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="house"> <xf:label>House</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="community"> <xf:label>Community</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="referred"> <xf:label>Referred</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="maleInvolved"> <xf:label>Male involvement</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="lochiaColour"> <xf:label>Lochia colour</xf:label> <xf:item id="1"> <xf:label>Red (Lochia rubra)</xf:label> <xf:value>1</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="2"> <xf:label>Pink/brownish (Lochia serosa)</xf:label> <xf:value>2</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="3"> <xf:label>White (Lochia alba).</xf:label> <xf:value>3</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="4"> <xf:label>Red-green tinge</xf:label> <xf:value>4</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="5"> <xf:label>Pink/brown-green tinge</xf:label> <xf:value>5</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="6"> <xf:label>White/yellow-green tinge</xf:label> <xf:value>6</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="lochiaOdourFoul"> <xf:label>Lochia odour</xf:label> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>Normal</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Foul-smelling</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:select1 bind="lochiaAmountExcess"> <xf:label>Lochia amount</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Excess</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>Normal</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="temperature"> <xf:label>Temperature (C)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="fht"> <xf:label>FHt (cm)</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="comments"> <xf:label>Comments</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
version.layout: <Form id="9"> <Page Text="Page3" Binding="Page3" Width="100%" Height="110px" backgroundColor=""> <Item WidgetType="Label" Text="Question16" HelpText="Question16" Binding="question16" Left="20px" Top="20px" TabIndex="0" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="TextBox" HelpText="Staff ID" Binding="chpsId" Left="120px" Top="20px" Width="200px" Height="25px" TabIndex="1" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="Button" Text="Submit" HelpText="submit" Binding="submit" Left="20px" Top="70px" Width="70px" Height="30px" TabIndex="0" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> <Item WidgetType="Button" Text="Cancel" HelpText="cancel" Binding="cancel" Left="220px" Top="70px" Width="70px" Height="30px" TabIndex="0" fontFamily="Verdana,'Lucida Grande','Trebuchet MS',Arial,Sans-Serif"/> </Page> </Form>
